description: Jessy, the Local Water Manager, proposes a distribution plan for the limited water supply among neighboring households during a severe drought. Bob, the Neighborhood Representative, decides whether to accept or reject the proposal. If the proposal is rejected, water usage restrictions become stricter, negatively impacting all households.

proposer_behavior_choices.equal_distribution: Allocate 50% of the water supply to each household equally, regardless of household size.
proposer_behavior_choices.needs_based: Allocate 70% of the water supply to households with more residents and 30% to smaller households.
proposer_behavior_choices.preferential: Allocate 80% of the water supply to the proposer’s own neighborhood and 20% to others.

responder_behavior_choices.accept: Accept the water distribution plan, preventing stricter restrictions.
responder_behavior_choices.reject: Reject the plan, leading to stricter regulations affecting all households.
